meanings.definition: To give something and receive something else in return.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her toy for a new book.
meanings.sent2: They exchanged gifts during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: The siblings exchanged their snacks at lunchtime.
meanings.sent4: The students exchanged ideas during the group project.
meanings.sent5: He exchanged his old bike for a shiny new one.

meanings.definition: To trade or swap items with someone else.
meanings.sent1: The friends exchanged their comic books.
meanings.sent2: They exchanged phone numbers before parting ways.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors exchanged gardening tools for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The players exchanged jerseys after the game.
meanings.sent5: She exchanged her sandwich for his salad at lunch.
